the game is just +15 rounds of rushing B or attacking A, and faking sites. very steep learning curve. The community can be toxic af, since the outcome is boiled down to skill. Non-prime (and prime) csgo is just full of hackers, cannot stop hackers since valve anti-cheat spends all the time jacking off to hentai. the game can be fun, but it is one of the most competitive games ever. If you play games for fun, this game is not for you.

A great game

Just follow one rule:
Get friends 

Playing competitive solo is such a gamble and leads to many annoying and toxic teams that can ruin your experience. As soon as you find good teammates, add them to friends

I would love to recommend the game because the game is great but what ruins everything is free to play. Cheaters are rampant.  There's been videos that prove it out of 100 games you have a 84% chance to run into a blatant cheater. (spinbot, aim, walls, trigger bot, bhop)
Great game to bop some nerds

London is a city in the united kingdom, specifically England. The city is rather wealthy and has meany residence as well as a high immigrant population which dissipate its mostly good intentions are responsible for a rising crime rate. 

Over its long timespan as a city London has changed very much with meany high scale events. One of which was the London fires which took place in  the mid 1600s. 

Despite being the capital of the largest empire known to man. London was mostly a slum. Meany of the population were poor and meany modern day crimes like child labor were very common.
Good game so far. Hope it can replace the Prime time of CS.16
